projects.name: ERP Management Software
projects.description: Developed a responsive web application using React, Express.js, and MongoDB, achieving a 40% reduction in load times. Implemented user authentication and secure file upload functionalities, enhancing data retrieval speed by 20%. Streamlined file management. Enhanced accessibility for higher authorities to download data in Excel format for analysis.

projects.name: Automated Security System
projects.description: Devised a Python-based security system with Flask for the UI, computed real-time object detection using OpenCV. Enhanced surveillance by capturing and emailing images upon detecting new objects, ensuring security measures. Instant email alerts upon detection. Upgraded surveillance and response capabilities by 10%, ensuring rapid incident response.

experiences.description: Built advanced software for Planetary Vision, analyzing various planetary bodies, which increased processing speed by 30%. Optimized efficiency for web browsers and ensured robust performance across multiple platforms. Assisted scientists at ISRO in analyzing geospatial data, supporting 5-6 formats (shapefile, GeoJSON, KML, CZML, XML, CSV).
